title: disreputableaccount
extract: disreputable. If a person or organization is disreputable, they have an image problem. They are — or at least appear to be — crooked, shady, or just plain bad news. ... If a person is disreputable, they have a bad reputation for some reason.
extract_html: disreputable. If a person or organization is disreputable, they have an image problem. They are — or at least appear to be — crooked, shady, or just plain bad news. ... If a person is disreputable, they have a bad reputation for some reason.
